# justingreenbaum.com

> Personal site of Justin R. Greenbaum — enterprise operations executive, advisor, and founder of Greenbaum Labs. 20+ years in operations (Comcast, frontline to VP). Now building Decision & Responsibility Infrastructure (DRI) — diagnostic systems that measure organizational alignment.

## About Justin
- Enterprise operations veteran (2005–present)
- Founder, Greenbaum Labs — AI diagnostic systems on local compute
- MIT Sloan Executive Education, Prosci Certified Change Practitioner
- Creator of the Coherence diagnostic framework

## Key Pages
- [Home](https://justingreenbaum.com/): Thesis on structural failure and Decision & Responsibility Infrastructure
- [About](https://justingreenbaum.com/about.html): Professional biography, career arc, services, credentials
- [Coherence Framework](https://justingreenbaum.com/coherence.html): Interactive overview of the Coherence diagnostic system
- [Coherence Deep Dive](https://justingreenbaum.com/coherence-deep.html): Failure modes, field notes, evidence discipline, AI governance
- [Decision & Responsibility Infrastructure](https://justingreenbaum.com/decision-responsibility-infrastructure.html): Field definition of DRI as a discipline

## Core Concepts
- **Coherence Triangle:** Truth (center-edge alignment), Authority (signal strength), Continuity (temporal consistency)
- **Decision & Responsibility Infrastructure (DRI):** Designing structural conditions where good decisions and clear accountability are the default
- **Failure Modes:** Taxonomy of 17 structural failure patterns in organizations (FM-01 through FM-17)
- **Functional Field Notes:** 21 early-warning observations from diagnostic fieldwork

## Related Properties
- [Greenbaum Labs](https://greenbaumlabs.com): AI workshop and diagnostic tools
- [Writing](https://writing.justingreenbaum.com): Essays on systems, responsibility, and governance
- [Greenbaum Photography](https://greenbaumphotography.com): Fine art and documentary photography
- [Megabrixels](https://megabrixels.com): Lego photography

- Email: justin@greenbaumlabs.com
